channel.title: nornir on nornir.tech
channel.description: Recent content in nornir on nornir.tech

item.title: CNaaS-NMS
item.description: Github Docs Campus Network-as-a-Service - Network Management System. Software to automate management of a campus network (LAN). This is an open source software developed as part of SUNETs managed service. Planned features: Zero-touch provisioning of switches Automation of common changes for campus LAN Automated procedure for firmware upgrades Multi-vendor support

item.title: Stockpiler
item.description: Gtihub Stockpiler gathers network device configurations and stores them in a local Git repository. Stockpiler utilizes Nornir, Netmiko, and GitPython for a fully self-contained backup solution, and has been tested to function on Linux, MacOS, and Windows.
